scripts.build-transform-dark: npx token-transformer tokens.json styles/tokens/02_themes/dark.json global,exported/dark,theme global
scripts.build-transform-light: npx token-transformer tokens.json styles/tokens/02_themes/light.json global,exported/light,theme global
scripts.build-transform-typography: npx token-transformer tokens.json styles/tokens/03_semantic/typography.json global,typography global --resolveReferences=false
scripts.build-transform: npm run build-transform-global && npm run build-transform-typography && npm run build-transform-dark  && npm run build-transform-light
scripts.build-styles: npm run copy-tokens && npm run build-transform && node style-token.js
